overview: Ellissia adopts a white stallion to train in the art of Mexican horse dancing. As she starts teaching the handsome but previously abused Centurion, Ellissia falls critically ill, which keeps her from competing in a celebrated equestrian event. Under the watchful eyes of her father, new ranch hand Danny steps in as trainer, hoping to win the competition â€” and, perhaps, Ellissia's heart.
tagline: They needed a miracle... and found a legend.
title: Centurion: The Dancing Stallion
